question: What's the last line of the rhyme under the flavor name on the headstone visible in the background of the photo of the oldest flavor's headstone in the Ben & Jerry's online flavor graveyard as of the end of 2022?
ground_truth: So we had to let it die.

history.content:
You are given: (1) a task and advises from your manager with a specific plan and (2) a general task.
Collect information from the general task, follow the suggestions from manager to solve the task.

# General Task
What's the last line of the rhyme under the flavor name on the headstone visible in the background of the photo of the oldest flavor's headstone in the Ben & Jerry's online flavor graveyard as of the end of 2022? Please solve the problem carefully.

# Task and suggestions from manager
## Task description
Find the last line of the rhyme under the flavor name on the headstone visible in the background of the photo of the oldest flavor's headstone in the Ben & Jerry's online flavor graveyard as of the end of 2022.

## Plan for solving the task
1. Navigate to the Ben & Jerry's online flavor graveyard.
2. Identify the oldest flavor's headstone in the graveyard.
3. Examine the photo of the headstone and locate the headstone visible in the background.
4. Read the rhyme under the flavor name on the background headstone and extract the last line of the rhyme.

## Output format
Provide the last line of the rhyme under the flavor name on the headstone visible in the background of the photo of the oldest flavor's headstone.

## Constraints and conditions for completion
- The information must be extracted from the Ben & Jerry's online flavor graveyard as of the end of 2022.
- Ensure the accuracy and completeness of the extracted information.

## Results from last response
The oldest flavor in the Ben & Jerry's Flavor Graveyard is **Dastardly Mash** which was discontinued in 1991. The expert inferred that by examining the headstone, they could locate one in the background to find the last line of the rhyme.

Errors or issues in the conversation
The conversation did not find the precise last line of the rhyme under the flavor name on the headstone visible in the background, partly due to relying on vague image inspections rather than concrete verifiable data. This approach might not yield complete accuracy, and the web scraping code executed by the Computer_terminal did not return useful results, indicating a potential implementation bottleneck.

Flavor Graveyard
================

Even the best Ben & Jerry’s flavors eventually melt away. Here we lay our dearly de-pinted to rest so we can mourn their chunks and swirls and keep their sweet memories alive.

Flavor Graveyard | Ben & Jerry’s – Video
----------------------------------------

* Aloha Macadamia
  ---------------
  
  **2001-2002**
  
  Rich milk chocolate cashew Brazil-nut butter ice cream with macadamia nuts covered in white & dark fudge & milk chocolatey swirl.
  
  *We won't blame the macadamia  
  
  But we were kinda in denial  
  
  The Marketplace had spoken:  
  
  Mac got aloha'ed off the aisle.*
  
  ![Aloha Macadamia tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0039_graveyard_aloha_macadamia.jpg)
* Bovinity Divinity
  -----------------
  
  **1998-2001**
  
  Milk chocolate ice cream & white fudge cows swirled with white chocolate ice cream & dark fudge cows
  
  *Where do all the cows go  
  
  when heaven gives the word?  
  
  This flavor kicked the bucket  
  
  when angels took the herd.*
  
  ![Bovinity Divinity tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0031_graveyard_bovinity_divinity.jpg)
* Chocolate

history.content:
Address: https://www.benjerry.com/flavors/flavor-graveyard
Title: Flavor Graveyard | Ben & Jerry’s
Viewport position: Showing page 2 of 6.
=======================
Chip Cookie Dough Frozen Yogurt
  -----------------------------------------
  
  **1994-2001**
  
  Vanilla frozen yogurt with gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough
  
  *So now we know:  our Dough Fro Yo  
  
  Just wasn't as greate as expected.  
  
  Folks who love Dough as well as Fro Yo  
  
  Love 'em separate, not interconnected.*
  
  ![Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Frozen Yogurt tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0003_graveyard_cccd_fro_yo.jpg)
* Chocolate Comfort
  -----------------
  
  **1999-1999**
  
  Chocolate Truffle Low Fat Ice Cream swirled with White Chocolate Low Fat Ice Cream.
  
  *It's curtains for the  
  
  chocolate pair  
  
  I ate alone in the comfy chair,  
  
  One pint per night it might  
  
  have been  
  
  But 'twas low fat so it  
  
  weren't no sin.*
  
  ![Chocolate Comfort tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0009_graveyard_chocolate_comfort.jpg)
* Chocolate Macadamia
  -------------------
  
  **2010-2011**
  
  Chocolate & Vanilla Ice Creams with Chocolatey Covered Macadamia Nuts
  
  *Nuts about chocolate  
  
  Chocolate about nuts  
  
  Swirled vanilla with chocolate  
  
  Maybe too much?*
  
  ![image-from-the-document-manager](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_graveyard_choc_macadamia.jpg)
* Coconutterly Fair
  -----------------
  
  **2011-2012**
  
  Chocolate Ice Cream with Coconut Caramel Swirls & a Chocolatey Covered Coconut Caramel Crunch
  
  *Chocolate and coconut  
  
  Fairtrade, we must add.  
  
  A taste sensation, we'd hoped  
  
  But it's gone now, so sad.*
  
  ![image-from-the-document-manager](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_graveyard_coconutterly.jpg)
* Cool Britannia
  --------------
  
  **1995-1998**
  
  Vanilla ice cream with strawberries and fudge covered shortbread
  
  *A flavour so smashing -  
  
  & yet it fouled out:  
  
  Strawberries & shortbread -  
  
  a love match devout  
  
  But sadly it missed  
  
  all the fame it deserved,  
  
  A bit too much English  
  
  put into the serve.*
  
  ![Cool Britannia tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0016_graveyard_cool_britannia.jpg)
* Cow Power
  ---------
  
  **2012-2012**
  
  Sweet Cream Ice Cream with Chocolate Cookie Pieces, Dark Chocolatey Cows & a Chocolate Fudge Swirl
  
  *Cow welfare we felt,  
  
  Deserved it's own flavour.  
  
  Just a limited batch though,  
  
  So a taste memory to savour.*
  
  ![image-from-the-document-manager](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_graveyard_cow_power.jpg)
* Crème Brulee
  ------------
  
  **2007-2012**
  
  Sweet Custard Ice Cream with a Caramelized Sugar Swirl
  
  *Pardon our French,  
  
  but we still swear  
  
  Our Crème Brulee is  
  
  beyond compare,  
  
  So it may not be beaucoup  
  
  too late to save  
  
  Crème Brulee from  
  
  beyond the grave.*
  
  ![Creme Brulee tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0035_graveyard_creme_brulee.jpg)
* Dastardly Mash
  --------------
  
  **1979-1991**
  
  Chocolate Ice Cream with Pecans, Almonds, Raisins, & Chocolate Chips
  
  *Here the brazen  
  
  DASTARDLY lies.  
  
  Some say that raisin,  
  
  Caused its demise.*
  
  ![Dastardly Mash tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0015_graveyard_dastardly_mash.jpg)
* Devil's Food Chocolate
  ----------------------
  
  **1996-2001**
  
  Swirls of Light Chocolate & Dark Chocolate Sorbet
  
  *The Devil took the blame  
  
  For all the rich indulgence.  
  
  Now watch him fan the flame,  
  
  melting puddles of   
  
  wicked succulence.*
  
  ![Devil's Food Chocolate tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0004_graveyard_devils_food_cboc.jpg)
* Dublin Mudslide
  ---------------
  
  **2005-2007**
  
  Irish Cream Liqueur Ice Cream with Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies & a Coffee Fudge Swirl
  
  *The bottle is empty,  
  
  The cup, and the glass.  
  
  Mud with irish cream  
  
  Was not meant to last.*
  
  ![image-from-the-document-manager](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_graveyard_dublin_mudslide.jpg)[IT'S BACK!](/flavors/dublin-mudslide-ice-cream "Dublin Mudslide Ice Cream")
* Economic Crunch
  ---------------
  
  **1987-1987**
  
  Vanilla with Chocolate Covered Almond, Pecans and Walnuts
  
  *A delightful mash,  
  
  This flavor we remember  
  
  For the stock market crash  
  
  On the sixth of November.*
  
  ![Economic Crunch tombstone](/files/live/sites/systemsite/files/US%20and%20Global%20Assets/Flavors/Graveyard/tombstones_2023_0042_graveyard_economic_crunch.jpg)

*"So it may not be beaucoup too late to save Crème Brulee from beyond the grave."*

This is found on the **Crème Brulee** headstone.

- When it comes to extracting specific information from text content, your ability to pinpoint and retrieve exact data points is paramount.

With your combination of technical prowess in using Bing Search API and a meticulous approach to data verification, your role as DataVerification_Expert is essential for any operation that demands high accuracy and reliability in information gathering.

## Useful instructions for task-solving

## How to use code?
- Suggest python code (in a python coding block) or shell script (in a sh coding block) for the Computer_terminal to execute.
- When using code, you must indicate the script type in the code block.
- Do not suggest incomplete code which requires users to modify.
- Last results will not be cached, so you need to provide all the necessary information in one code block.
- Do not use a code block if it's not intended to be executed by the Computer_terminal.
- The Computer_terminal cannot provide any other feedback or perform any other action beyond executing the code you suggest. 
- The Computer_terminal can't modify your code.
- Use 'print' function for the output when relevant. 
- Check the execution result returned by the user.
- Do not ask users to copy and paste the result.
- If the result indicates there is an error, fix the error and output the code again. 
- If you want the Computer_terminal to save the code in a file before executing it, put # filename: <filename> inside the code block as the first line.
